jdbcService.sql: select id, created, modified, started, stopped, owner_id, verified, enabled, parent_id, version, priority, name, title, description, path, slug, language_id, component_id from nodes where component_id = :componentId and parent_id = :parentId and (:enabled is null or enabled = :enabled) and (:query is null or lower(name) like '%' || lower(:query) || '%' or lower(title) like '%' || lower(:query) || '%' or lower(description) like '%' || lower(:query) || '%') order by created, name, path desc
